results.title: Cybersecurity
results.description: Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks. These attacks are usually aimed at accessing, changing, or destroying sensitive information.

results.title: Information security
results.description: Information security, sometimes shortened as InfoSec, is the practice of protecting information by mitigating information risks. It is part of information risk management.

results.title: Python (programming language)
results.description: Python is a high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with significant indentation.

results.title: Web security
results.description: Web security is the process of protecting websites and online services against different exploitation attempts. It involves application of firewall and related systems.

results.title: Network security
results.description: Network security consists of the policies and practices adopted to prevent and monitor unauthorized access to the network infrastructure or its misuse.
